full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Mechanical Services at David-Florida Laboratory (DRL)

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) has released a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide mechanical building maintenance services at the David-Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa.

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** CB-8843-37261497
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** 9F023-23-0127
* **Publication Date:** September 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 22, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 16, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 31, 2024

### Services Required
The successful bidder will provide building maintenance staff in mechanical work for maintenance and repair at DFL. The scope of work is described in Annex A - Statement of Work.

### Site Visit
A site visit is optional, but recommended, and will be held on September 14, 2023, at 10:00 AM (EDT) at DFL. Interested bidders must communicate their attendance to the Contracting Authority by September 13, 2023.

### Tender Evaluation
The bid evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Important Information
* The RFP is available on the Canada Buys website.
* Interested bidders must register on the Canada Buys website to access the RFP.
* The bid submission deadline is September 22, 2023, 14:00:00.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact Mélanie Séguin, Contracting Authority, at 438-364-1399 or melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca.
